data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ai, Deqiang, Wang, Yinglun, Zhang, Yalin (2019): A new genus and two new species in the tribe Selizini (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Flatidae) with a checklist for the tribe from China. Zootaxa 4614 (2): 368-382, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4614.2.6|27 occurrences
